page.title: 04Changes in our area
page.content: HOP PICKING Our area used to be very famous for hop picking but now it is not so important.A place called the roundel in an Oast House was used to dry all the hops.They used to dry them with coal but now they use oil.Families from London came all the way just to pick the hops but nowadays they are picked by a team on a machine. FRUIT PICKING Our area has always been famous for fruit.Mr.Dolding our caretaker knows all about our area.He can remember when fruit was very cheap but now it is much more expensive because it costs more to produce. HOUSES Mr.Dolding told us that a lot of old cottages have disappeared and have been replaced by flats.
